thread.section_title: DiscountMugs Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DiscountMugs | www.discountmugs.com
thread.title: Josephine Anderson

author: Josephine Anderson
title: Josephine Anderson
text:
The service was great, When I called the first thing Carmen did was ask me how I was doing and how could she help. After I explained my situation to her, gave her the invoice # she confirmed that the order was in production and would be delivered on the dated needed. She checked to make sure they had the correct address for deliver and we learned that the state was not correct. She made the corrections and asked if there was anything else she could help me with. Great Customer Service! I will recommend this company and will use them again in July for next conference.
Thank you for a great experience. Josephine
